titleHead: Reason for late appeal - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: Tell us why your appeal is late
appealsShouldBeMadeWithOneMonth: Appeals should be made within one month of the Mandatory Reconsideration Notice being sent.
appealMayGoAheadForGoodReason: Your appeal may still go ahead if there’s a reason why it's late.
noGoodReasonWhyLate: I don’t have a good reason why my appeal is late

reasonForBeingLate.label: Enter the reason for why your appeal is late

error.required: If you want to appeal, you must say why your appeal is late
